name: KLM Full Flight | Amsterdam to Birmingham | Boeing 737-700 (Night Flight, No ATC)
description:
A full length full flight video in real time with KLM, from Amsterdam to Birmingham, onboard Boeing 737-700 PH-BGR operating flight KL1435 on August 29 2016.

**Every moment of the flight included from airport to airport. Cabin footage at many points of the flight, no ATC to allow relaxation**

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSFACEBOOK: facebook.com/inflightvideo
TWITTER: twitter.com/inflightvideo
INSTAGRAM: instagram.com/inflightvideo

Airline:  KLM
Flight:  KL1435
Aircraft:  Boeing 737-700 PH-BGR
From:  Amsterdam (AMS)
To:  Birmingham (BHX)
Departure:  21:23
Arrival:  21:11
Flight Time:  0:48
Seat:  12A
Flight Map:  https://goo.gl/eGaU4H

This evening's flight begins with a walk through the terminal at Amsterdam's Schiphol airport.  We head for our gate where our aircraft for this evening's flight is waiting for us, Boeing 737-700 PH-BGR.

We soon board the aircraft and take our seat in the exit row seat 12A, over the wing.  It is getting quite dark by the time we push back from the gate, and take the long taxi to runway 36L, the Polderbaan.  By the time we take off the sun has already set but there is still some sunlight on the horizon.  We cross the North Sea towards London, before making a right turn and commencing our approach towards Birmingham.

We make a smooth approach and landing into Birmingham, touching down smoothly on schedule at 21.11, with the time difference arriving 12 minutes before we took off from Amsterdam!

We walk through Birmingham Airport to the street. 

TIMELINE

0:00:03  Walking through the terminal at Schiphol
0:05:44 Boarding the aircraft through the jetway
0:34:20  Pushback
0:36:00 Taxi to runway 36L
0:51:55 Takeoff from runway 36L
1:13:10  Cabin footage
1:41:00  Final approach to runway 33 at Birmingham
1:43:30  Touchdown on runway 33 and taxi to terminal
1:51:00  Disembarking through jetway and 



CREDITS

Cameras:

Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
You need this for the suction mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
Scanner for ATC: Yupiteru MVT-7300
Recorder for ATC: Olympus VN-741PC http://amzn.to/2fb4Lab
